content.rendered:
Directed by Ilan Abudi. Laliv Sivan

Written by David Akerman

Cast Rotem Sela( Shira4 episodes, 2022 ). Doron Ben-David( Amir4 episodes, 2022 ). Zvika Hadar( Meni4 episodes, 2022 ). Makram Khoury( Abdullah4 episodes, 2022 ). Hisham Suliman( Riad4 episodes, 2022 ). Ala Dakka( Salah4 episodes, 2022 ). Anastasia Fein( Galya4 episodes, 2022 ). Uli Sternberg( Efi4 episodes, 2022 ). Oded Leopold( Ilan4 episodes, 2022 ). Yoav Keren( Shaul4 episodes, 2022 ). Danny Geva( Barak4 episodes, 2022 ). Amjad Bader( Fares4 episodes, 2022 ). Jerry Hyman( Samuel4 episodes, 2022 ). Noa Kamir( Hodaya4 episodes, 2022 ). Nasrin Kadry( Salma4 episodes, 2022 ). Yehoyachin Friedlander( Patriarch of Jerusalem4 episodes, 2022 ). Jameel Khoury( George4 episodes, 2022 ). Vered Feldman( Amir’s wife4 episodes, 2022 ). Osnat Fishman(4 episodes, 2022 ). Adam Haloon( Abed4 episodes, 2022 ). Zach Cohen(4 episodes, 2022 ). Kevin Rubin(4 episodes, 2022 ). Slava Bibergal(4 episodes, 2022 ). Ohad Shahar(4 episodes, 2022 ). Mahmoud More(4 episodes, 2022 ). Osher Maimon(4 episodes, 2022 ). Rasha Jahshan(4 episodes, 2022 ). Simon Kricheli(4 episodes, 2022 ). Ilan Hazan(4 episodes, 2022 ). Chen Lev( Andreus4 episodes, 2022 ). Assaf Sharon( Amir’s son4 episodes, 2022 ). Shlomy Arba(4 episodes, 2022 ). Nahda Shurush(4 episodes, 2022 ). Ron Jaegermann(4 episodes, 2022 ). Jonathan Brenner(4 episodes, 2022 )

Language Hebrew

Producers Moshe Danon. Chaim Sharir. Milki Shnider. Kfir Weiss

Production Drama-Team. HOTI. TV Studios.

Season 1

Total Episodes 4
